name: Checklist Bot
details:
The [Checklist Bot](https://louisjeck.github.io/checklist-trello-bot/) power-Up adds:

- **Checklist templating**
    - assign a checklist *template* to each list
    - automatically add the *template*'s checklists to any card added or moved to a list

- **Automated actions on check** when an item is checked in a checklist such as:
    - Move the card to another list in the board
    - Move the card to another board
    - Assign a label
    - Archive the card

If you use Trello for process management, check it out.
Powered by OCTO Technology 2017 (LJE & CDU)
details2:
Raise your productivity with **[Butler for Trello](https://butlerfortrello.com)**:

- Customize Trello with buttons that perform your favorite actions on a card or on the board.

- The Butler automatically analyzes your recent usage and recommends buttons to save you clicks and time.

- Sort lists by due date, title, time in list, votes, labels or the value of a custom field.

- Create/copy/move/archive cards, add labels/checklists/due dates, assign to a member, and much more.

##Screenshots##

![Card Buttons](https://butlerfortrello.com/img/screenshot-card-button.png)



![Powerup](https://butlerfortrello.com/img/screenshot-powerup.png)
